title: Register FO-08 in left navigation menu
description:
Add FO-08 to the left navigation menu.

File to modify:
- nav.config.ts

Add this entry to the navTree array (after FO-07):

{
  label: 'FO-08',
  href: '/fo-08',
  children: [
    { label: 'Demo', href: '/fo-08' },
    { label: 'Info', href: '/fo-08/info' },
  ],
},

Do not close this tick until the verification passes.
acceptance_criteria: grep -q 'FO-08' nav.config.ts && grep -q '/fo-08/info' nav.config.ts && echo PASS
